lead_paragraph: With reports circulating that Lynch, a Seattle running back, was considering retiring, he posted a photo on Twitter of two green cleats hanging up.

headline.print_headline: Seahawks’ Lynch Points at Retirement by Hanging Up Cleats on Twitter
headline.main: Seahawks’ Marshawn Lynch Points Toward Retirement

snippet: With reports circulating that Lynch, a Seattle running back, was considering retiring, he posted a photo on Twitter of two green cleats hanging up.
abstract: Seattle Seahawks running back Marshawn Lynch, who was reportedly considering retiring, posts photo on Twitter of two green cleats hanging up.
